divs: sighting detailsthere was no air conditioning in those days, and my family and i were sitting under a shade tree on the east side of our house. we first noticed the object in a fluttering descent from west to east, approximately 1\4 of a mile northwest of the house. it went out of site behind our barn for a few seconds, then continued to descend until it was at at tree-top level with a wooded area located to the northeast of our location. the ufo made a 90degree left turn and flew into an opening between our woods and our neighbors', still descending. my father believed a small airplane had just crashed, and he and i ran the quarter mile to the woods in the heat of an august afternoon. we found nothing, no wreckage, no broken tree limbs, nothing! i have no memory of its shape. the color was dull grey, and i destinctly remember the fluttering motion which reminded me of a kite with a broken string. there were five of us, father, mother (both deceased) two younger sisters and myself.
Summary: UFO appeared to crash in wooded area a quarter mile from observers.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Butler
This sighting has never been favorited.
